title: Lady Snowblood (Manga)

Lady Snowblood (ÃƒÂ¤Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â®ÃƒÂ§Ã‚Â¾Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ÃƒÂ©Ã¢â‚¬ÂºÃ‚ÂªÃƒÂ¥Ã‚Â§Ã‚Â«, Shurayuki-hime) is a gory revenge-themed action manga by writer Kazuo Koike and artist Kazuo Kamimura. The plot centers around Oyuki, an assassin who seeks vengeance against the bandits who raped her mother and murdered her father and brother, often using her sexual appeal as a weapon. Originally published in Japan in the early 1970s, it was translated and published in English by Dark Horse Comics.
